data.text:
Haa……haa. 
Ha………… …………
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Haa……haa. 
<story>Ha………… …………

data.text:
……I let it get away. 
The 『Oka Sho』……a once-in-a-lifetime chance……!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……I let it get away. 
<story>The 『Oka Sho』……a once-in-a-lifetime chance……!

data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Damnit!! Damnit……!! 
<story>~~~~~…………!!!!

data.text: ………………I need to go, right.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>………………I need to go, right.

data.text:
The winners would be praised and applauded, the losers 
would vent their frustration behind the scenes. This 
is how the once-in-a-lifetime 『Oka Sho』 ended……
data.processed:
<story>The winners would be praised and applauded, the losers 
<story>would vent their frustration behind the scenes. This 
<story>is how the once-in-a-lifetime 『Oka Sho』 ended……

data.text:
So then, once more! We're starting Kraft-san's victory celebration! 
……Cheers!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>So then, once more! We're starting Kraft-san's victory celebration! 
<story>……Cheers!

data.text: Cheers~!
data.name: Teammates
data.processed: <story>Cheers~!

data.text:
Wah, wah, wah! Everyone……! Thank you very much! 
This became a pretty big deal, huh……!?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Wah, wah, wah! Everyone……! Thank you very much! 
<story>This became a pretty big deal, huh……!?

data.text:
Everyone from the team's here but…… 
Messiah-san and Heart-san too! Both of you came too……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Everyone from the team's here but…… 
<story>Messiah-san and Heart-san too! Both of you came too……

data.text:
Fufuu. Well, I lost so I can't 
say I don't have mixed feelings, but――
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu. Well, I lost so I can't 
<story>say I don't have mixed feelings, but――

data.text:
That you won is an irrefutable fact. Being able to praise 
that which is praiseworthy is just part of running races.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>That you won is an irrefutable fact. Being able to praise 
<story>that which is praiseworthy is just part of running races.

data.text:
That's correct. ……it was a splendid run 
befitting the title of Cherry Blossom Queen. 
It makes me proud to be your teammate, Kraft.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>That's correct. ……it was a splendid run 
<story>befitting the title of Cherry Blossom Queen. 
<story>It makes me proud to be your teammate, Kraft.

data.text: Cesario……everyone……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Cesario……everyone……!

data.text:
Yeah……yeah, thank you! Me too…… 
it makes me proud to have fought against such strong rivals!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah……yeah, thank you! Me too…… 
<story>it makes me proud to have fought against such strong rivals!

data.text:
Kraft. Not just your rivals……it seems like a 
bunch of others came to congratulate you though?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft. Not just your rivals……it seems like a 
<story>bunch of others came to congratulate you though?

data.text:
Kraft. Not just your rivals……it seems like a 
bunch of others came to congratulate you though?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft. Not just your rivals……it seems like a 
<story>bunch of others came to congratulate you though?

data.text: Eh……H-huh!? Everyone, why are you……!?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Eh……H-huh!? Everyone, why are you……!?

data.text:
Yo! You showed me something intense at the 『Oka Sho』, Kraft! 
You did well to win that hot-blooded battle!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Yo! You showed me something intense at the 『Oka Sho』, Kraft! 
<story>You did well to win that hot-blooded battle!

data.text:
Yeah. You didn't just simply win the race…… 
All of you, brought that to life. From that run, 
I could feel your strength and iron will.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. You didn't just simply win the race…… 
<story>All of you, brought that to life. From that run, 
<story>I could feel your strength and iron will.

data.text:
You're still no match for Sweepy though! It seems like even 
you can cast some decent magic. ……Not bad at all, Kraft!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>You're still no match for Sweepy though! It seems like even 
<story>you can cast some decent magic. ……Not bad at all, Kraft!

data.text:
Wawawawa……Sweep-san, and my other senpai…… 
thank you very much! Um……i-i-it's an honor!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Wawawawa……Sweep-san, and my other senpai…… 
<story>thank you very much! Um……i-i-it's an honor!!

data.text:
Oh my……Kraft-san, there's no need to be so stiff. 
As an Oka Sho Uma Musume, you could be a bit more dignified.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Oh my……Kraft-san, there's no need to be so stiff. 
<story>As an Oka Sho Uma Musume, you could be a bit more dignified.

data.text:
I guess it's because Sweep Tosho was someone she already 
looked up to. On top of that, Air Groove and Hishi Amazon――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I guess it's because Sweep Tosho was someone she already 
<story>looked up to. On top of that, Air Groove and Hishi Amazon――

data.text:
I guess it's because Sweep Tosho was someone she already 
looked up to. On top of that, Air Groove and Hishi Amazon――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I guess it's because Sweep Tosho was someone she already 
<story>looked up to. On top of that, Air Groove and Hishi Amazon――

data.text:
I think it's natural that she'd be like that when 
she's surrounded by so many 『Queen Uma Musume』
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I think it's natural that she'd be like that when 
<story>she's surrounded by so many 『Queen Uma Musume』

data.text:
Queen Uma Musume……in other words, 『The Strongest Senior Class Uma 
Musume』, a URA title reserved for the best and brightest.
data.processed:
<story>Queen Uma Musume……in other words, 『The Strongest Senior Class Uma 
<story>Musume』, a URA title reserved for the best and brightest.

data.text:
For Rhein Kraft and the others in the Triple Tiara rotation, these 
Uma Musume could almost be called an existence above the clouds――
data.processed:
<story>For Rhein Kraft and the others in the Triple Tiara rotation, these 
<story>Uma Musume could almost be called an existence above the clouds――

data.text:
Even then, those impressive senpai came all 
the way here. That's just how impressive the 
race that Kraft-san showed them was, you know?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Even then, those impressive senpai came all 
<story>the way here. That's just how impressive the 
<story>race that Kraft-san showed them was, you know?

data.text: ――Really, it's something to be proud of.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>――Really, it's something to be proud of.

data.text:
True. After defeating such strong Uma Musume 
like Cesario, Daring Heart, and Air Messiah, 
Rhein Kraft could almost be seen as a hero.
data.processed:
<story>True. After defeating such strong Uma Musume 
<story>like Cesario, Daring Heart, and Air Messiah, 
<story>Rhein Kraft could almost be seen as a hero.

data.text:
It seems like that impression was already spreading through 
Tracen Academy, with many Uma Musume coming to the after party――
data.processed:
<story>It seems like that impression was already spreading through 
<story>Tracen Academy, with many Uma Musume coming to the after party――

data.text:
Oh man, we're late……! This is because you kept worrying 
『My hair just doesn't look right~』, you know, Scarlet!?
data.name: Vodka
data.processed:
<story>Oh man, we're late……! This is because you kept worrying 
<story>『My hair just doesn't look right~』, you know, Scarlet!?

data.text:
Even you kept saying 『These clothes won't work~』 
the whole time, didn't you!? You're no different from me!!
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
<story>Even you kept saying 『These clothes won't work~』 
<story>the whole time, didn't you!? You're no different from me!!

data.text:
Ah……Vodka-san and Scarlet-san! 
Both of you came too?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Ah……Vodka-san and Scarlet-san! 
<story>Both of you came too?

data.text: Kraft! You were amazing, congratulations!!
data.name: Both
data.processed: <story>Kraft! You were amazing, congratulations!!

data.text: Ooooh-……! As usual, both of you are in synch~.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Ooooh-……! As usual, both of you are in synch~.

data.text: No we're not!!
data.name: Both
data.processed: <story>No we're not!!

data.text:
Forget that……well. It really was amazing, Kraft. 
……it makes us think we need to do that too, we 
need to show that we can do that too.
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
<story>Forget that……well. It really was amazing, Kraft. 
<story>……it makes us think we need to do that too, we 
<story>need to show that we can do that too.

data.text:
Your run was really exciting! When we got back to the 
academy after that we ended up running like crazy!
data.name: Vodka
data.processed:
<story>Your run was really exciting! When we got back to the 
<story>academy after that we ended up running like crazy!

data.text:
Next it's us, we need to do that too. 
……Seriously, it was really cool, Kraft!!
data.name: Vodka
data.processed:
<story>Next it's us, we need to do that too. 
<story>……Seriously, it was really cool, Kraft!!

data.text:
……! 
Cool――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……! 
<story>Cool――

data.text: Fufuu……Ehehe.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Fufuu……Ehehe.

data.text:
You've got a silly look on your face, don't you? 
I'm glad you're having fun though.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>You've got a silly look on your face, don't you? 
<story>I'm glad you're having fun though.

data.text:
Ah……yeah, the party's fun, and I'm happy. ……and besides that, 
I wonder if I was able to do what I wanted to!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Ah……yeah, the party's fun, and I'm happy. ……and besides that, 
<story>I wonder if I was able to do what I wanted to!

data.text:
What you wanted to?……You mean becoming someone like our 
senpais? 『Someone that everyone looks up to』, becoming 
a link for the girls that come next, that talk?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>What you wanted to?……You mean becoming someone like our 
<story>senpais? 『Someone that everyone looks up to』, becoming 
<story>a link for the girls that come next, that talk?

data.text:
Yeah! I really want to be able to fulfill that. 
If it's the 『Oaks』 then……to become an ideal 
for so many girls, just like Air Groove-san!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! I really want to be able to fulfill that. 
<story>If it's the 『Oaks』 then……to become an ideal 
<story>for so many girls, just like Air Groove-san!

data.text:
I want to show them how much stronger I can be too. 
……I won't lose to you at the 『Oaks』 either, Cesario!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I want to show them how much stronger I can be too. 
<story>……I won't lose to you at the 『Oaks』 either, Cesario!

data.text:
Despite the growing number of participants, the party 
continued on. Of course, I also joined, wholeheartedly 
celebrating Rhein Kraft's victory, however――
data.processed:
<story>Despite the growing number of participants, the party 
<story>continued on. Of course, I also joined, wholeheartedly 
<story>celebrating Rhein Kraft's victory, however――

data.text:
(I couldn't really talk to her……because I had 
something weighing on my mind. When I saw her 
celebrating, I couldn't help but feel sorry……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I couldn't really talk to her……because I had 
<story>something weighing on my mind. When I saw her 
<story>celebrating, I couldn't help but feel sorry……)

data.text: Yes? Did you need something?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Yes? Did you need something?

data.text:
Fuu, ahahaa! Was it that surprising? 
……Or, is it 『Because it's me』 that you're so surprised?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Fuu, ahahaa! Was it that surprising? 
<story>……Or, is it 『Because it's me』 that you're so surprised?

data.text:
……in regards to the 『Oka Sho』 results. 
Is there something bothering you, Trainer?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……in regards to the 『Oka Sho』 results. 
<story>Is there something bothering you, Trainer?

data.text:
(Cesario seems to have already noticed…… 
there was no point in hiding it.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Cesario seems to have already noticed…… 
<story>there was no point in hiding it.)

data.text:
(Cesario seems to have already noticed…… 
there was no point in hiding it.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Cesario seems to have already noticed…… 
<story>there was no point in hiding it.)

data.text:
I told her everything. That before the 『Oka Sho』 I had given Rhein 
Kraft advice. ……and the advice that I hadn't given to Cesario.
data.processed:
<story>I told her everything. That before the 『Oka Sho』 I had given Rhein 
<story>Kraft advice. ……and the advice that I hadn't given to Cesario.

data.text:
……I see. In that case, if you had given me that advice……for example, 
『Match Kraft and accelerate early』, if you had said that――
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……I see. In that case, if you had given me that advice……for example, 
<story>『Match Kraft and accelerate early』, if you had said that――

data.text:
Would it have been enough to guarantee 
that I would win the 『Oka Sho』?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Would it have been enough to guarantee 
<story>that I would win the 『Oka Sho』?

data.text:
Right. That's just how races are. 
Nobody knows what the results will be 『If only』
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Right. That's just how races are. 
<story>Nobody knows what the results will be 『If only』

data.text:
……truly, I don't think it's possible to know. If I 
had accelerated earlier, considering how she held on, 
I'm not sure I could have passed her……honestly.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……truly, I don't think it's possible to know. If I 
<story>had accelerated earlier, considering how she held on, 
<story>I'm not sure I could have passed her……honestly.

data.text: ――Trainer.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>――Trainer.

data.text:
I believe saying any more than that……about our earnest 
run, the results that Kraft achieved, about me……and 
above all else, to you yourself as a trainer, is rude.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I believe saying any more than that……about our earnest 
<story>run, the results that Kraft achieved, about me……and 
<story>above all else, to you yourself as a trainer, is rude.

data.text:
『To run in a way that befits me』. ……I believe 
that was the best course of action for the Oka 
Sho. As a trainer, I believe you acted correctly.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>『To run in a way that befits me』. ……I believe 
<story>that was the best course of action for the Oka 
<story>Sho. As a trainer, I believe you acted correctly.

data.text:
Any more than this―― 
and I'll have to ask you to stop disparaging my trainer.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Any more than this―― 
<story>and I'll have to ask you to stop disparaging my trainer.

data.text:
I was about to apologize again, but I stopped 
myself. Cesario had a satisfied smile on her face 
as she looked up to the stars――and then said――
data.processed:
<story>I was about to apologize again, but I stopped 
<story>myself. Cesario had a satisfied smile on her face 
<story>as she looked up to the stars――and then said――

data.text:
Trainer. I think……together with Kraft, I can't help 
but wonder what kind of wonderful future awaits us.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Trainer. I think……together with Kraft, I can't help 
<story>but wonder what kind of wonderful future awaits us.

data.text:
Yes. Just by watching her, I think it will link 
to the future……I will be the one to guide the 
girls that start running for that same reason.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Yes. Just by watching her, I think it will link 
<story>to the future……I will be the one to guide the 
<story>girls that start running for that same reason.

data.text:
With my dream, and those girls' dreams. By combining those two, 
I wonder……if it will lead to a never seen before scene.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>With my dream, and those girls' dreams. By combining those two, 
<story>I wonder……if it will lead to a never seen before scene.

data.text:
Fufu, sorry, for suddenly bringing this up. 
……But, strangely, that's how I feel.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, sorry, for suddenly bringing this up. 
<story>……But, strangely, that's how I feel.

data.text:
However, for that reason, I can't stay as I am. 
I can't guide them if I don't shine. To become 
that guiding light, I must earn that crown.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>However, for that reason, I can't stay as I am. 
<story>I can't guide them if I don't shine. To become 
<story>that guiding light, I must earn that crown.

data.text:
……the 『Oaks』 is the only race in the Tiara rotation that matches 
the classic races in distance. To win, it requires strength.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……the 『Oaks』 is the only race in the Tiara rotation that matches 
<story>the classic races in distance. To win, it requires strength.

data.text:
As its name suggests, similar to an Oak, it has 
a solid, unwavering, overwhelming strength. 
……At the 『Oaks』 I will prove I have that strength.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>As its name suggests, similar to an Oak, it has 
<story>a solid, unwavering, overwhelming strength. 
<story>……At the 『Oaks』 I will prove I have that strength.

data.text:
……Yeah. We should stop worrying over the 『Oka Sho』. Next time 
……I'll continue to work to properly support both of you!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……Yeah. We should stop worrying over the 『Oka Sho』. Next time 
<story>……I'll continue to work to properly support both of you!

data.text:
I returned back to my room to look over my documents again. 
Next up is the second battle of the Triple Tiara that Rhein 
Kraft and Cesario will be running in, the 『Oaks』
data.processed:
<story>I returned back to my room to look over my documents again. 
<story>Next up is the second battle of the Triple Tiara that Rhein 
<story>Kraft and Cesario will be running in, the 『Oaks』

data.text:
……As I thought. Looking at past records……with any distance 
above 2000m, Kraft is rarely able to defeat Cesario……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……As I thought. Looking at past records……with any distance 
<story>above 2000m, Kraft is rarely able to defeat Cesario……

data.text: ……An issue of 『Distance Aptitude』, huh――
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……An issue of 『Distance Aptitude』, huh――
